# AffiliateB

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="affiliateb"
  data-afb_a="l44x-y174897c"
  data-afb_p="g2m"
  data-afb_t="i"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact [AffiliateB](https://www.affiliate-b.com/web/contact/form.php).

Supported parameters:

-   `data-nend_params`
